basic_info.name: Adikavi Nannaya University Admission
description: Admission at Adikavi Nannaya University is based on the entrance exams. Candidates interested in applying, need to fill out the online application and appear in the entrance tests. Based on the marks obtained, a rank list of the shortlisted students is released. The selected students must attend a document verification round. Once the verification is done, students must pay the course fee, on the university portal. Aspirants can follow the below-given steps to apply at Adikavi Nannaya University.
How to apply at Adikavi Nannaya University?
Check more: Adikavi Nannaya University Admission

basic_info.name: Adikavi Nannaya University Placements
description: Adikavi Nannaya University has an active and dedicated placement cell that regularly arranges workshops, guest lectures and training programs to enhance the skills of the students. The University also gives students ample opportunities to participate in campus recruitment drives attended by renowned companies. In the placement drive 2023, ANU students have been placed in TCS, Wipro, Infosys, BYJU, Mindtree and HAYGOT. The, highest salary package offered was 4.80 LPA to engineer graduates.

basic_info.name: Adikavi Nannaya University Facilities

basic_info.name: Adikavi Nannaya University FAQs Ques. Which companies visit Adikavi Nannaya University for placements? Ans. In 2019-2020, AKNU was visited by companies like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, BYJU, Mindtree and HAYGOT. The highest salary package was 10LPA which was offered by BYJU. Ques. What is the format for NANNAYACET conducted by AKNU? Ans. The candidate has to answer 100 multiple choice questions in 90 minutes. Each question contains four alternative answers. Ques. Are any scholarships available at Adikavi Nannaya University? Ans. Residential Scholarships are available for Students across all reserved categories. It can be availed if the student satisfies the condition of minimum 75% attendance in College in each quarter. If the candidate puts in less than 75% of attendance for valid reasons, he/she shall be paid scholarship in proportion to the attendance. Those who are absent themselves without valid reasons will not be paid any scholarship. Ques. What is the hostel fee at Adikavi Nannaya University? Ans: The hostel fee is same for both girls’ and boys’. The fee is based on the time duration of the students' course. The bifurcated detail of hostel fee is given below: S.no. Fund/expenditure Amount (In Rs.) Duration 1. Refundable caution deposit 4000/- - 2. Hostel development fund 2000/- 2 Years Course ( non refundable non transferable) 3. Hostel development fund 3000/- 3 Years Course( non refundable non transferable) 4. Hostel development fund 4000/- 4 Years Course( non refundable non transferable) 5. Mess expenditure per month Varies from 1900 to 2100+ maintenance charges - Ques. What is the intake for B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at Adikavi Nannaya University? Ans. The intake for CSE is 60. Infact, the total number of seats available in all branches of B.Tech offered at Adikavi Nannaya University is 60 each. Ques. What is the application fee for the AKNU CET conducted by Adikavi Nannaya University? Ans. The application fee for Adikavi Nannaya University Common Entrance Test is INR 500 for general or OBC and INR 300 for SC/ST/PH. Ques. What courses are offered by Adikavi Nannaya University? Ans. Adikavi Nannaya University offers B.Tech and B.Ed at the UG level and at the PG level it offers courses such as M.Tech, MBA, MSc, M.P.Ed., and MA. Ques. Does AKNU accept national or state level entrance exam scores for the admission process? Ans. Yes, ANU accepts AP-EdCET, AP-EAMCET, NANNAYACET, CAT, MAT, XAT and APICET exam scores for the admission process. Ques. Does AKNU offer hostel facilities to its students? Ans. Yes, AKNU provides hostel facilities to the students studying at the institute. There are 2 separate hostels available for male and female students which also offer mess facilities. Ques. Does AKNU train its students for placement and internships? Ans. Yes, AKNU has an active and dedicated placement cell which regularly arranges workshops, guest lectures and training programs to enhance the skills of the students. The University also gives students ample opportunities to participate in campus recruitment drives attended by renowned companies. Ques. Does AKNU offer scholarships to its students? Ans. Yes, AKNU offers Jagananna Vidya Deevena (RTF), Jagananna Vasathi Devena (MTF) scholarship schemes to the research scholars. And Janmabhoomi yojana scholarship scheme for the reservation category candidates. Ques. What is the cutoff score for the B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering program at AKNU? Ans. AKNU accepts 11046 AP-EAMCET score for female candidates and 35189 AP-EAMCET score for male candidates for the B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering program from general category.

Section.name: About AKNU
Section.description:
Adikavi Nannaya University is a state university located in Rajahmundry, Andhra Pradesh. The UGC-approved institution was established in 2006. Spread across 4 campuses, the university offers programs in Arts and Commerce, Law, Engineering, Education, and Science & Technology. Moreover, Adikavi Nannaya University has 450+ affiliated and 6 constituent colleges in Andhra Pradesh.

Along with UG, PG, and professional courses, the state university extends its faculty to research and innovation programs. innovation. Approved by AICTE Adikavi Nannaya University offers BA, B.Com, B.Voc, B.Tech, and B.Ed at the UG level. At the PG level, it offers courses such as M.Tech, MBA, MSc, M.P.Ed., and MA. The admissions are based on entrance scores of an applicant. Adikavi Nannaya University considers APICET, AKNUCET, and AP EDCET scores as selection criteria. Check more: Adikavi Nannaya University Admission
The placement cell at Adikavi Nannaya University does a satisfactory job. As per the official NIRF 2023 report, overall placements concluded with the highest median salary of INR 4.8 LPA.
3.1 How to Apply?
ANU offers the following courses at the UG & PG level:
Know More: Adikavi Nannaya University Courses & Fees
Admission at Adikavi Nannaya University is based on the entrance exams. Candidates interested in applying, need to fill out the online application and appear in the entrance tests. Based on the marks obtained, a rank list of the shortlisted students is released. The selected students must attend a document verification round. Once the verification is done, students must pay the course fee, on the university portal. Aspirants can follow the below-given steps to apply at Adikavi Nannaya University.
How to apply at Adikavi Nannaya University?
Register on the official website @aknu.edu.in
Navigate to the admissions link highlighted or click on the admission tab.
Once clicked, the aspirant will be directed to the admission portal, and start registering with a contact number and an email address.
Now login with the same credentials and navigate the application link for the registered students.
Click on Apply and proceed to choose the course and faculty.
Now enclose all the academic and personal documents.
Re-check the details mentioned and fill in the application fee via net banking
Once filled, retain the application form and fee receipt for future reference.
Check more: Adikavi Nannaya University Admission
